title: The realest news
content:encoded:
It’s been at least three months since we last made a Big Announcement, so we’re due for another and here it is.

Please listen to this short chat and if you have any questions afterwards visit: https://thespinoff.co.nz/trpquestions

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
